bioconda.name: bioconductor-roar
bioconda.summary: Identify differential APA usage from RNA-seq alignments

biotools.summary: Identify preferential usage of APA sites, comparing two biological conditions, starting from known alternative sites and alignments obtained from standard RNA-seq experiments.

bioschemas.name: roar
bioschemas.summary: Identify preferential usage of APA sites, comparing two biological conditions, starting from known alternative sites and alignments obtained from standard RNA-seq experiments.
